welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Canyon Lake, a charming city known for its breathtaking views and endless outdoor activities. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
